message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I understand that $150 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I can offer it to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'd like to get it down to $128. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $128?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $129. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $126?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $127. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate all the concessions you've made, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $126 and $127. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $126.50?
